title: An Effective Federated Learning Verification Strategy and Its Applications for Fault Diagnosis in Industrial IoT Systems
summaries: proposed __an FL framework__ using a stacking model to solve device heterogeneity, unbalanced data distribution, and contaminated data in industrial environment, specifically to diagnose interturn short circuit (ITSC) faults in permanent magnet synchronous motors (PMSMs)
in the framework, a clean verification data set on the server is used to select appropriate client models
an improved particle swarm optimization (PSO) is used to optimize the weight coefficients of clients for aggregation
